scripts.copy-uxp-js: rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-js && cp -r node_modules/uxp-documentation/_transclusions/photoshop/uxp/reference-js src/pages/uxp/ && cp node_modules/uxp-documentation/reference-js.js reference-js.js
scripts.copy-uxp-css: rm -rf src/pages/uxp/reference-css && cp -r node_modules/uxp-documentation/_transclusions/photoshop/uxp/reference-css src/pages/uxp/ && cp node_modules/uxp-documentation/reference-css.js reference-css.js
scripts.copy-uxp: npm run copy-uxp-js && npm run copy-uxp-css
